abstract: Losses on investments weakened by the deepening housing crisis have forced the Bank of America to close a multibillion-dollar high-yield fund, the largest of its kind, after wealthy investors withdrew billions of dollars in assets.
lead_paragraph: Losses on investments weakened by the deepening housing crisis have forced the Bank of America to close a multibillion-dollar high-yield fund, the largest of its kind, after wealthy investors withdrew billions of dollars in assets.

headline.main: Mortgage Crisis Forces BofA Fund to Close
